name: Flavorful Flounder For the Oven
author: Lola
summary: My variation on an already fantastic fish recipe. I just tweaked it to make it easier for myself. I'm all about ease when it comes to cooking these days.
ingredients: 2 pounds flounder fillets, rinsed and patted dry
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Prepare a 9x13-inch baking dish with nonstick cooking spray
Season both sides of flounder fillets with salt
Place into the prepared baking dish
Brush 1 tablespoon lemon juice over fillets
Mix remaining lemon juice, Parmesan cheese, melted butter, mayonnaise, and green onions in a bowl; spoon over the fillets
Bake flounder in preheated oven for 10 minutes
Switch oven to broil; broil fillets until the tops are just browned, 3 to 5 minutes
